region¶

Identity v3

region create¶

Create new region

os region create
    [--parent-region <region-id>]
    [--description <description>]
    [--url <url>]
    <region-id>
--parent-region <region-id>¶

Parent region ID

--description <description>¶

New region description

--url <url>¶

New region URL

<region-id>

New region ID

region delete¶

Delete region

os region delete
    <region-id>
<region-id>

Region ID to delete

region list¶

List regions

os region list
    [--parent-region <region-id>]
--parent-region <region-id>¶

Filter by parent region ID

region set¶

Set region properties

os region set
    [--parent-region <region-id>]
    [--description <description>]
    [--url <url>]
    <region-id>
--parent-region <region-id>¶

New parent region ID

--description <description>¶

New region description

--url <url>¶

New region URL

<region-id>

Region to modify

region show¶

Display region details

os region show
    <region-id>
<region-id>

Region to display
